sentence.Network_en: The period of literary and artistic efflorescence has come.
sentence.Network_cn: 文艺创作的繁盛时期已经来到.

sentence.Network_en: And it may leads to impracticable structure and coast risks in the rainy and efflorescence areas.
sentence.Network_cn: 并且对于降雨强度高、岩土易风化的地区,工程结构很容易被架空,存在滑坡等风险.

sentence.Network_en: Architecture, sculpture, painting, music, and poetry, may truly be called the efflorescence of civilized life.
sentence.Network_cn: 建筑 、 雕塑 、 绘画 、 音乐与诗歌, 可真正称为人类步入文明社会的产物.
